user_review: Noodles! Noodles! Noodles!  Wuhan is a chinese city famous for its delicious dim-sums and noodles.This restaurant brings real Wuhan flavour noodles to Montreal. If you want to try traditional Chinese noodles, go ahead, Style Wuhan is there for you.You can have a full wonderful lunch for only 10 bucks. Additional, the restaurant is a real classic Chinese street food style restaurant.Love it

Their signature dish is the wuhan style hot dry noodles (热干面), which comes in thin or thick noodles. The noodles are very authentic, as are the other traditional wuhan side dishes. Their low pricing and close proximity to Concordia campus makes it a great lunch spot for ppl on the go
